scripts.init: pnpm i --lockfile && npx cap add ios && npx cap add android && node scripts/add-permissions.js && npx cap sync
scripts.start:ios: NODE_ENV=production pnpm build && npx cap sync ios && npx cap run ios
scripts.start:android: NODE_ENV=production pnpm build && npx cap sync android && npx cap run android
scripts.build:apk: pnpm build && npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug && cd ..
scripts.release:apk: pnpm build && npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && cd ..
scripts.build:bundle: pnpm build && npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew bundleRelease && cd ..
